name: Blizzard Strayer
title: Wintry Wandering: Blizzard Strayer

in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Cryo.

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Cryo. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
